summary: This document contains Know Your Customer (KYC) information related to Jeffrey Epstein and associated accounts, including the Butterfly Trust. It details account ownership, relationships, and financial information relevant to Epstein and his associates, including Ghislaine Maxwell. This document contains Know Your Customer (KYC) information for various individuals and entities associated with Jeffrey Epstein, including details about their financial backgrounds, relationships with Deutsche Bank, and any potential legal issues. It highlights the Butterfly Trust, which is linked to Epstein, and provides insights into the wealth profiles of individuals involved.
